name: Meson
highlight: Meson is the faster and safer way to execute low-cost, zero-slippage stablecoin cross-chain swaps between Avalanche and other 16 leading blockchains and layer-2 rollups.
summary: Meson is a stablecoin swap protocol facilitating stablecoin free flows among Ethereum, Layer 2s, and major high-performance public chains. With its all-new product design and technology stacks, Meson offers point-to-point swaps among major stablecoins on any supported networks with fast confirmation, minimal fees and zero slippage.
